content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'melchi-cosmosdb'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [melchi-cosmosdb]
    WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = '4NdNnrRvS9W9SHT4UVVgPEwjm8nIYKFSA5kSdbgckr221y3m8Z2vy51UfCyjM9lZE353iKW27FKsACDbGTJRsQ=='
GO

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=melchi-cosmosdb;Database=nyctxidb',
                OBJECT = 'Heartbeat',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'melchi-cosmosdb'
) AS [Heartbeat]
